properties.areaDesc: Niagara River to Hamlin Beach NY
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 11 at 4:45AM EST until January 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, west winds to 35 knots and waves
8 to 11 feet expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, east
winds to 30 knots and waves 6 to 9 feet expected.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Ontario from the Niagara
River to Hamlin Beach.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 7 AM to 1 PM EST Sunday. For
the Small Craft Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 7 AM EST
Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 1 PM EST SUNDAY
